hero.slide2Subtitle: The best choice for your new web project

about.title: About Us
about.description1: At tree3code, we believe technology should feel human. We build web solutions with intention — focused on real people, real needs, and real impact. Whether it's a landing page, an online store, or a custom internal system, we design it with clarity, care, and future growth in mind.
about.subtitle: What makes us different?
about.description2: We listen before we code. Every project starts with understanding — and ends with a tailored solution that’s functional, beautiful, and scalable. No cookie-cutter sites here: just thoughtful development made for your vision.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We offer tailored solutions for your business, always with cutting-edge technology and a results-oriented approach.

items.title: Web Development
items.description: We build modern, fast websites tailored to your needs.

items.title: Custom Systems
items.description: We design and implement systems that automate and improve your processes.

items.title: Tech Consulting
items.description: We help you make strategic decisions based on technology.

items.title: Performance Optimization
items.description: We speed up your site and reduce load times for a better user experience.

items.title: API Integration
items.description: We connect your systems with external services like payment gateways, CRMs or third-party platforms.

items.title: Maintenance & Support
items.description: We provide continuous follow-up to keep your site updated, secure, and working properly.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Some featured projects we've developed recently.

reserves.long: Design of a clean and elegant landing page aimed at building trust and attracting new clients

inventory.long: Design of an eye-catching landing page with e-commerce integration, built for local produce sellers.

ecommerce.title: Total control of your business finances
ecommerce.long: Design of an internal platform with authentication, reports, and transaction tracking for efficient management.

crm.title: Digitized medical care
crm.long: Design of a clear and professional landing page featuring essential info, schedules, and online appointment form.

education.title: Style and comfort in one click
education.long: Design of a promotional page with a visual product catalog, designed to boost online sales.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Every project is unique. Tell us about yours and we’ll give you a personalized proposal.
